name: BEEDOCS Timeline 3D 3 Document
summary: Document created by BEEDOCS Timeline 3D version 3, an application used for creating interactive 3D historical timelines; stores historical events, each of which is mapped on the timeline; can include pictures, dates, sounds, video, notes, and other event information; can be shared on the Web, through iTunes or YouTube video, or as an insert in an Apple Keynote presentation.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
